cz.ive.ontology
Class SingleToken

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.ontology.SingleToken
All Implemented Interfaces:
OntologyToken, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DelegationProcessSuitabilityTemplate, EvalTreeTriggerTemplate, Expansion, Goal, GoalTreeNode, HuntGoalTriggerTemplate, MoveGoalTriggerTemplate
public class SingleToken
extends java.lang.Object
implements OntologyToken, java.io.Serializable

Simple implementation of OntologyToken containing data in only one ontology specified during construction.

Author:
ondra
See Also:

Method Detail

supports

public boolean supports(java.lang.String ontology)
Queries whether this token contains data of given ontology

Specified by:
supports in interface OntologyToken
Parameters:
ontology - identifier of ontology being questioned
Returns:
true iff this token contains data in this ontology. Successive call to getData(ontology) will not fail.

getData

                         throws OntologyNotSupportedException
Retrieval of data in given ontology

Specified by:
getData in interface OntologyToken
Parameters:

Returns:
ontology specific data
Throws:

getOntologies

public java.lang.String[] getOntologies()
Retrieval of all ontologies supported

Specified by:
getOntologies in interface OntologyToken
Returns:
array of ontology identifiers. Successive calls to getData( ontology), provided that ontology is one of the returned array, will not fail.
